channel.title: 路透财经

item.title: 德国沃诺维亚公司因财产危机导致 2023 年亏损 73.5 亿美元
item.description:

item.title: 观看：壳牌以天然气需求旺盛和能源转型中的不确定性为由，削弱了 2030 年的碳减排目标，并取消了 2035 年的目标，尽管该公司确认了到 2050 年实现净零排放的计划。
item.description:
WATCH: Shell weakened its 2030 carbon reduction target and scrapped a 2035 objective, citing expectations for strong gas demand and uncertainty in the energy transition even as it affirmed a plan to cut emissions to net zero by 2050 https://t.co/M231QvJRwy pic.twitter.com/ssIMPRgCvT

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 对冲基金经理因从教育科技初创公司挪用 5.33 亿美元面临逮捕
item.description:

item.title: 英国央行将于第三季度开始减息，但第二季度减息的可能性很大--路透调查
item.description:
Bank of England to start cutting in Q3 but strong chance of Q2 move - Reuters poll https://t.co/9B3Ssw6RFh pic.twitter.com/B9WmUDWEvv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 随着美联储准备降息，投资者又开始转向美国银行。但奥本海默资产管理公司的约翰-斯托尔茨福斯告诉我们，随着商业房地产债务的恶化，另一个地区性银行倒闭是有可能的
item.description:
As the Fed prepares to cut rates, investors are turning back to US banks. But John Stoltzfus of Oppenheimer Asset Management told us another regional bank collapse is possible as commercial real-estate debt turns sour pic.twitter.com/w29ea2iGJs

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 观看：这家苹果供应商表示，预计今年的营收将大幅增长。在公布第四季度利润超出市场预期后，该公司将人工智能服务器的蓬勃需求归功于其中一个因素
item.description:
WATCH: The Apple supplier said it expects revenue to rise significantly this year. It credited booming demand for AI servers as one factor after it posted fourth-quarter profit that beat market expectations https://t.co/sEfWvY9lmR pic.twitter.com/7x5cJFEZZE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 看苹果供应商富士康在公布第四季度利润超过市场预期后表示，在人工智能服务器需求旺盛的情况下，该公司预计 2024 年收入将大幅增长。
item.description:

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024
